languages.text: Слуга приоткрывает рот в молитве, и вы замечаете во рту обрубок купированного языка.

traits.locale_text: Слуга приоткрывает рот в молитве, и вы замечаете во рту обрубок купированного языка.

languages.text: The servant opens his mouth in prayer and you see the stub of his mutilated tongue.
languages.original_text: Слуга приоткрывает рот в молитве, и вы замечаете во рту обрубок купированного языка.

traits.locale_text: The servant opens his mouth in prayer, and you see the stub of the docked tongue.
The servant opens his mouth in prayer, and you see the stub of the docked tongue.
The servant opens his mouth in prayer, and you see the stub of his mutilated tongue.
The servant opens his mouth in prayer, and you see the stub of his mutilated tongue.
The servant opens his mouth in prayer and you see the stub of his mutilated tongue.
The servant opens his mouth in prayer and you see the stub of his mutilated tongue.

languages.text: Der Diener öffnet den Mund, um zu beten, und du siehst den Stummel seiner abgeschnittenen Zunge.
languages.original_text: The servant opens his mouth in prayer and you see the stub of his mutilated tongue.

traits.locale_text: Der Diener öffnet den Mund, um zu beten, und du siehst den Stummel seiner abgeschnittenen Zunge.

languages.text: Le serviteur ouvre la bouche pour prier et vous voyez ce qu'il reste de sa langue mutilée.
languages.original_text: The servant opens his mouth in prayer and you see the stub of his mutilated tongue.

traits.locale_text: Le serviteur ouvre la bouche pour prier et vous voyez ce qu'il reste de sa langue mutilée.

languages.text: 仆人张开嘴祈祷，你看到了他残缺不全的舌头。
languages.original_text: The servant opens his mouth in prayer and you see the stub of his mutilated tongue.

traits.locale_text: 仆人张开嘴祈祷，你看到了他残缺不全的舌头。

languages.text: 従者が祈ろうと口を開けると、切断された舌の一部が見えた。
languages.original_text: The servant opens his mouth in prayer and you see the stub of his mutilated tongue.

traits.locale_text: 従者が祈ろうと口を開けると、切断された舌の一部が見えた。
従者が祈ろうと口を開けると、切断された舌の一部が見えた。

languages.text: El sirviente abre la boca en muda plegaria, dejándote ver el muñón de su lengua mutilada.
languages.original_text: The servant opens his mouth in prayer and you see the stub of his mutilated tongue.

traits.locale_text: El sirviente abre la boca en muda plegaria, dejándote ver el muñón de su lengua mutilada.

languages.text: Hizmetkâr dua etmek için ağzını açtığında kesilmiş dilinin kökünü görebiliyorsun.
languages.original_text: The servant opens his mouth in prayer and you see the stub of his mutilated tongue.

traits.locale_text: Hizmetkâr dua etmek için ağzını açtığında kesilmiş dilinin kökünü görebiliyorsun.
